CustomField.description: This is used to provide estimated value for direct and Indirect workflow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In EURO. In Case of "Change in Masterdata" it is "Annual Accumulated Value".(No negative values are allowed) For COQ Approval Submission: “Total cost 3 yrs (with Cost as quoted | TCO, Tooling costs)” of the proposed supplier
CustomField.label: Estimated Value (without taxes )
